greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = mu(n) + 3, where mu is the Mobius function (A008683).
comment: If n is a prime or a semiprime, a(n) gives the number of divisors of n.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..5000
Index entries for sequences computed from exponents in factorization of n
xref: One more than A080847, two more than A007423.
results.author: _Wesley Ivan Hurt_, Nov 13 2013
